name: Team Superpowers Portrait
description:
The Team Superpowers Portrait is a simple worksheet to help teams better understand the different personalities, working styles and strengths present in their group. Knowing how co-workers like to work and what they’re really good at allows teams to improve collaboration and shorten the learning curve for new employees or recent additions to the team.


— Made with love by the team behind Purpose Cards



At Studio Für Morgen, we have developed a number of card decks called Purpose Cards to facilitate reflection and conversations about things that matter. The latest edition helps individuals reflect upon their strengths and determine what their superpowers are (currently only available in German). The Superpowers Portrait allows for these strengths to be made visible within the team.


Acting as a user manual for each team member, the Superpowers Portrait fosters understanding and psychological safety, a key ingredient for happy, successful teams.


For more information visit:

https://purpose.cards/en/blogs/news/team-superpowers-portrait
